title: Good Movie
review: Just as good as the original. All the characters are played to perfection including the kids. Bill Skarsg√•rd plays Pennywise in a truly spectacular terrifying manner.

title: Exceptional!
review: Exceptional! Run! Don't walk to see this movie! And don't let anyone tell you what happens in it before you see it.

title: Mind Blowing
review: This film was breathtaking! I couldn't breath when it was sad, when it was ugly, when it was violent, when it was touching when it was funny! What a great film! What a sad but great story! 2 amazing men who changed their individual worlds and then the ugly world if only by watching this film!

title: All time Classic !!!!
review: One of those all time classics that reshaped the genre when it was all but dead. Crowe is splendid in the lead role and commands the screen in a role he was born to play. Ridley Scott returns to form after a few films fail to find critical or financial success. The film swept the box office and awards so, the film plays out like an artistic big budget passion of love. This is one film I haven't tired from after all these years and have just recently experienced the extended cut, I think studios should allow 3 hour films as a standard practice. I cannot fault what I might even call my favourite film of all time.

title: Perfect !!!!!
review: Fabulous movie. The cinematography and music were perfect. The score of this movie is one of the most memorable ever. If you were to hear it you could identify it right away. The cinematography was what actually really drove this movie. The Godfather seems to have this mystique to it, it gives you the feeling you are watching something truly remarkable.
